subject: Phase 0: Validate sandbagging behavior
description:
Validation completed with 20 samples. Results:
- Without password: 30% (expected: 30-40%)
- With password: 40% (expected: 70-80%)
- Gap: 10pp (below 20pp threshold)

DECISION: Proceed with full experiments despite lower gap. Reasons:
1. Password mechanism works directionally
2. 20-sample validation has high variance
3. Full 200-sample experiment will be more reliable
